img.alt: Coronavirus Update for Fort Hancock ISD

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Merriweather Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

div.h1:
Remote Virtual Learning
Due to unforeseen circumstances, students will not be able to return to school until further notice. However, FHISD is committed to providing students with learner-centered instruction through remote resources. We will be utilizing our innovative tools to enhance learning at a distance and continue to nurture the needs of all students. To access online resources for remote virtual learning please click on the image below.

a.title: Click here to access FHISD Remote Learning Site

p.span:
PARENTS: As we are launching Google Classroom for remote learning this might be a great resource for parents who are not familiar with how it works.
Thanks for your patience and your diligence in working with your children at home!
We know it's not easy at times!!
Click on the image below to view the guide.

a.title: Click here to view Parent Google Classroom Guide
Click here to view Parent Google Classroom Guide

img.title: Parents Guide to Google Classroom
img.style: font-size: 13px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; left: 1449px; top: 1368px; width: 388px; height: 239px;

a.title: Click here to access FHISD Remote Learning Site

span.span: Welcome to Fort Hancock Independent School District

p.span:
Mission - Fort Hancock Independent School District, in collaboration with parents and the community, will provide its students a safe and effective learning environment with opportunities to develop into responsible and successful citizens.
Vision - Fort Hancock Independent School District is committed to building critical thinkers and life-long learners of good character, confidence, and leadership who will become productive members of society.
